data.taskTitle: when i resume tmux a -t CrystalTundra it opens tmux but cant type
when i resume tmux a -t CrystalTundra it opens tmux but cant type
data.approach: Investigate common causes of frozen tmux sessions: 1) Check if copy-mode is active (prefix+q to exit), 2) Check for flow control issues (Ctrl+q to resume), 3) Check for blocking processes, 4) Document solutions

data.taskTitle: when i resume tmux a -t CrystalTundra it opens tmux but cant type
summary: Root cause: Terminal flow control (Ctrl+S freeze)
findings: This is not tmux-specific but a terminal feature
recommendedActions: Try Ctrl+Q to unfreeze the session
Add stty -ixon to ~/.bashrc to prevent future freezes

data.taskTitle: when i resume tmux a -t CrystalTundra it opens tmux but cant type
summary: Diagnosed frozen tmux issue: Ctrl+S flow control freeze, fix with Ctrl+Q
Added jat find-session command to find session ID by agent name
Added jat resume AgentName to resume sessions by agent name
Added -fs and -r shortcuts for quick access
